title: 98: The What's in Lisa's Amazon Cart Episode
itunes:title: The What's in Lisa's Amazon Cart Episode
description: On today’s episode, we find out what Lisa has been buying from Amazon over the past month! Things like snacks, beverages, meal-prep ingredients, and so much more! Plus, the one beauty find that you NEED TO BUY RIGHT NOW. Seriously, it’s a game-changer. (We know you haven’t gone to the salon in at least a month!) And Lisa interviews the founder of an incredible coffee company that donates a portion of all sales to help out pooches in need.  So push play now, and then when you’re done, head on over to our Foodcast page for a list of the products mentioned in the episode!
itunes:summary: Have you been wondering what Lisa’s ordering from Amazon while being quarantined? We thought so! This episode is for you!
itunes:author: Lisa Lillien
dc:creator: Lisa Lillien
